00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename T, precision P>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void axisAngle
00014         (
00015                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & mat,
00016                 detail::tvec3<T, P> & axis,
00017                 T & angle
00018         )
00019         {
00020                 T epsilon = (T)0.01;
00021                 T epsilon2 = (T)0.1;
00022 
00023                 if((abs(mat[1][0] - mat[0][1]) < epsilon) && (abs(mat[2][0] - mat[0][2]) < epsilon) && (abs(mat[2][1] - mat[1][2]) < epsilon))
00024                 {
00025                         if ((abs(mat[1][0] + mat[0][1]) < epsilon2) && (abs(mat[2][0] + mat[0][2]) < epsilon2) && (abs(mat[2][1] + mat[1][2]) < epsilon2) && (abs(mat[0][0] + mat[1][1] + mat[2][2] - (T)3.0) < epsilon2))
00026                         {
00027                                 angle = (T)0.0;
00028                                 axis.x = (T)1.0;
00029                                 axis.y = (T)0.0;
00030                                 axis.z = (T)0.0;
00031                                 return;
00032                         }
00033                         angle = static_cast<T>(3.1415926535897932384626433832795);
00034                         T xx = (mat[0][0] + (T)1.0) / (T)2.0;
00035                         T yy = (mat[1][1] + (T)1.0) / (T)2.0;
00036                         T zz = (mat[2][2] + (T)1.0) / (T)2.0;
00037                         T xy = (mat[1][0] + mat[0][1]) / (T)4.0;
00038                         T xz = (mat[2][0] + mat[0][2]) / (T)4.0;
00039                         T yz = (mat[2][1] + mat[1][2]) / (T)4.0;
00040                         if((xx > yy) && (xx > zz))
00041                         {
00042                                 if (xx < epsilon) {
00043                                         axis.x = (T)0.0;
00044                                         axis.y = (T)0.7071;
00045                                         axis.z = (T)0.7071;
00046                                 } else {
00047                                         axis.x = sqrt(xx);
00048                                         axis.y = xy / axis.x;
00049                                         axis.z = xz / axis.x;
00050                                 }
00051                         }
00052                         else if (yy > zz)
00053                         {
00054                                 if (yy < epsilon) {
00055                                         axis.x = (T)0.7071;
00056                                         axis.y = (T)0.0;
00057                                         axis.z = (T)0.7071;
00058                                 } else {
00059                                         axis.y = sqrt(yy);
00060                                         axis.x = xy / axis.y;
00061                                         axis.z = yz / axis.y;
00062                                 }
00063                         }
00064                         else
00065                         {
00066                                 if (zz < epsilon) {
00067                                         axis.x = (T)0.7071;
00068                                         axis.y = (T)0.7071;
00069                                         axis.z = (T)0.0;
00070                                 } else {
00071                                         axis.z = sqrt(zz);
00072                                         axis.x = xz / axis.z;
00073                                         axis.y = yz / axis.z;
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                         return;
00077                 }
00078                 T s = sqrt((mat[2][1] - mat[1][2]) * (mat[2][1] - mat[1][2]) + (mat[2][0] - mat[0][2]) * (mat[2][0] - mat[0][2]) + (mat[1][0] - mat[0][1]) * (mat[1][0] - mat[0][1]));
00079                 if (glm::abs(s) < T(0.001))
00080                         s = (T)1.0;
00081                 angle = acos((mat[0][0] + mat[1][1] + mat[2][2] - (T)1.0) / (T)2.0);
00082                 axis.x = (mat[1][2] - mat[2][1]) / s;
00083                 axis.y = (mat[2][0] - mat[0][2]) / s;
00084                 axis.z = (mat[0][1] - mat[1][0]) / s;
00085         }
00086 
00087         template <typename T, precision P>
00088         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> axisAngleMatrix
00089         (
00090                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & axis,
00091                 T const angle
00092         )
00093         {
00094                 T c = cos(angle);
00095                 T s = sin(angle);
00096                 T t = static_cast<T>(1) - c;
00097                 detail::tvec3<T, P> n = normalize(axis);
00098 
00099                 return detail::tmat4x4<T, P>(
00100                         t * n.x * n.x + c,          t * n.x * n.y + n.z * s,    t * n.x * n.z - n.y * s,    T(0),
00101                         t * n.x * n.y - n.z * s,    t * n.y * n.y + c,          t * n.y * n.z + n.x * s,    T(0),
00102                         t * n.x * n.z + n.y * s,    t * n.y * n.z - n.x * s,    t * n.z * n.z + c,          T(0),
00103                         T(0),                        T(0),                        T(0),                     T(1)
00104                 );
00105         }
00106 
00107         template <typename T, precision P>
00108         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> extractMatrixRotation
00109         (
00110                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & mat
00111         )
00112         {
00113                 return detail::tmat4x4<T, P>(
00114                         mat[0][0], mat[0][1], mat[0][2], 0.0,
00115                         mat[1][0], mat[1][1], mat[1][2], 0.0,
00116                         mat[2][0], mat[2][1], mat[2][2], 0.0,
00117                         0.0,       0.0,       0.0,       1.0
00118                 );
00119         }
00120 
00121         template <typename T, precision P>
00122         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> interpolate
00123         (
00124                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m1,
00125                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m2,
00126                 T const delta
00127         )
00128         {
00129                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> m1rot = extractMatrixRotation(m1);
00130                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> dltRotation = m2 * transpose(m1rot);
00131                 detail::tvec3<T, P> dltAxis;
00132                 T dltAngle;
00133                 axisAngle(dltRotation, dltAxis, dltAngle);
00134                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> out = axisAngleMatrix(dltAxis, dltAngle * delta) * m1rot;
00135                 out[3][0] = m1[3][0] + delta * (m2[3][0] - m1[3][0]);
00136                 out[3][1] = m1[3][1] + delta * (m2[3][1] - m1[3][1]);
00137                 out[3][2] = m1[3][2] + delta * (m2[3][2] - m1[3][2]);
00138                 return out;
00139         }
00140 }//namespace glm
